GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.29 to before v4.14.283
GSD.description:
scsi: fcoe: Fix Wstringop-overflow warnings in fcoe_wwn_from_mac()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit 14a762155f87d3b3a371e48554fcb4fb3a2147fd, it was introduced in version v2.6.29 by commit 85b4aa4926a50210b683ac89326e338e7d131211. For more details please see the references link.
